Name: Moussaka
Description: A classic Greek dish made with layers of eggplant, spiced ground beef, and creamy bechamel sauce, baked to perfection. Served with a side of Greek salad.

Name: Souvlaki
Description: Grilled skewers of marinated meat (usually pork, chicken or lamb) served with pita bread, tzatziki sauce, and a side of Greek salad.

Name: Spanakopita
Description: A savory pastry made with phyllo dough, spinach, feta cheese, and herbs, baked until crispy and golden brown. Served with a side of Greek salad.

Name: Dolmades
Description: Grape leaves stuffed with a mixture of rice, herbs, and sometimes ground meat, served with lemon juice and olive oil. Served with a side of Greek salad.

Name: Greek Salad
Description: A fresh and colorful mix of lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, red onion, feta cheese, and olives, dressed with olive oil and vinegar.

Name: Tzatziki
Description: A creamy dip made with Greek yogurt, grated cucumber, garlic, and olive oil, served with pita bread or as a condiment for grilled meats.

Name: Saganaki
Description: A popular Greek appetizer made with fried or grilled cheese (usually Kefalotyri or Halloumi), served with lemon wedges and sometimes honey. Served with a side of Greek salad.

Name: Greek Gyro
Description: A traditional Greek street food, made with grilled meat (usually lamb, chicken, or pork) wrapped in a warm pita with lettuce, tomato, onion, and tzatziki sauce. Served with a side of Greek salad.

Name: Pastitsio
Description: A hearty casserole made with layers of pasta, spiced ground beef, and creamy bechamel sauce, baked to perfection. Served with a side of Greek salad.

Name: Feta Psiti
Description: A simple yet flavorful dish of baked feta cheese topped with olive oil, herbs, and sometimes tomato slices. Served with a side of pita bread.

Name: Keftedes
Description: Fried meatballs made with ground beef or lamb, breadcrumbs, and herbs, served with tzatziki sauce and a side of Greek salad.
